item.title: AI Takeover (part 1)
item.description: WHUT??? the world (not only the developers) has been introduced to the latest step in AI hype: ChatGPT, it gathered widespread media attention not during its initial release in December 2022 but in the beginning of 2023. After a couple of years where AI and ML Advancements were incremental (but impressive for certain applications), this marked a distinct step for many (including me). Was this the first time AI made headlines?
